messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: This is it. The most important election in 100 years, this is your chance to take back control of our country from the Metro elite who don't listen to your concerns, have never had a real job, and will say anything to get your votes. UKIP is a vote for common sense, a vote to stop your tax being wasted by the EU. Vote UKIP to put £3 Billion into the NHS, and to stop unlimited and unchecked immigration. UKIP will support our farmers and recover our fishing industry. Please, I need your vote to help bring change to Bristol NW.

messages.title: How we can change the future together

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER, Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 Billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: Vote UKIP to stop your tax being wasted by the EU.
issues.economy: UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home. By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid.
issues.health: UKIP will pour £3 Billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
issues.immigration: Control our borders. UKIP wants a FAIRER, Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
issues.socialWelfare: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Judi Gasking on behalf of Michael Frost, Therapia, BS10 6AE.
